home.text_base_description: Spectacular Hollywood Hills View Home! Mt. Olympus Adjacent. Completed in 2013! At the end of a very private street, gates open to this palatial, 5 bedroom/6.5 bath Mediterranean Masterpiece situated on a private drive. Dramatic spiral marble staircase for access to all three floors, a dazzling skylight welcomes you to a fabulous open floor plan with great city and canyon views. 1st floor boasts a huge living room w/ fireplace which adjoins dining room. Over-sized office with built-ins/custom cabinetry and city views. Take the elegant curved staircase jeweled with exquisite iron work down to two (2) generous-sized, en-suite bedrooms w/ custom cabinetry and ample walk-in closets. Master suite boasts fireplace, balcony w/ views, spa tub! 3rd level has room for a pool table, plus a bonus entertainment room with a full bar, a private sauna, pool bath and two (2) additional bedrooms. Visit this VIEW oasis - walking distance to the best gyms, restaurants/clubs, boutiques, etc.
